## ACOUSTIC\_CONTEXT\_COMPONENT\_TYPE\_REF\_RESOLVERS variable

A multi-provider token used for dependency injection of the [ComponentTypeRefResolver](./react-api.componenttyperefresolver.md)<!-- -->s.

```typescript
providers: [
  {
     provide: ACOUSTIC_CONTEXT_COMPONENT_TYPE_REF_RESOLVERS,
     useClass: MyResolver,
     multi: true
  }
]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ACOUSTIC_CONTEXT_COMPONENT_TYPE_REF_RESOLVERS: Required<import("react").Context<ComponentTypeRefResolver[]>>
```
